short_description: The cat tells you the CPU consumption of Mac by running speed.
summary:
RunCat provides a key-frame animation to the menu bar.
Animation changes the speed depending on the CPU consumption of Mac.
explain2: Default runners which you can use for free.
draw_runner: 1. Draw your own Runner with a paint tool etc.
open_preferences: 2. Open the registration tab from Preferences.
edit_runner: 3. Write Runner's name and select images.
preview: - You can check your animation using preview.
drag_drop: - You can sort by drag & drop.
register: 5. Press the register button to complete registration.
warning: * This function is a fee-charging content.
